variable.name: Sample Type
variable.description: Indicates the Tumor / Normal status of a sample

variable.name: Tissue Site
variable.description: General body site where sample was collected

variable.name: Cho et al.
variable.description: Six molecular subgroups of medulloblastoma (termed c1 to c6), each with a unique combination of numerical and structural chromosomal aberrations that globally influence mRNA and miRNA expression. For details see: Cho et al., 2011, PMID:21098324

variable.name: Northcott et al.
variable.description: Four distinct, nonoverlapping molecular variants (WNT, SHH, group C, and group D) with significant subgroup-specific demographics, histology, metastatic status, and DNA copy number aberrations. For details see: Northcott et al., 2011 PMID:20823417

variable.name: Histological Subtype
variable.description: Subtype of medulloblastoma as determined by pathology review
